title: Annual closing prices - Volkswagen shares 2013 to 2018
summary: Overall Common stock, and Preferred stock are gradually decreasing,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Preferred stock, and lastly, 2. Common stock.
Preferred stock reported the lowest Share prices in euros about 133.35 in Year 2016
The greatest difference of Share prices in euros between Common stock and Preferred stock occurs at Year 2015 and the smallest difference occurs at 2016.

max_summary: Overall Common stock, and Preferred stock are gradually decreasing,  throughout the Year
The minimum Share prices in euros about 133.35, occured at 2016 by Preferred stock.
The difference of Share prices in euros between Common stock and Preferred stock is smaller at Year 2016 compared to the Year 2013.
